name: FELINE-THE-CAT-WITH-3-LIVES
description:
FELINE THE CAT WITH 3 LIVES  the game is aimed at rescuing a kitten that's been abducted by a demon that demands all retrieved gold, silver and bronze coins. In order for the kitten to be liberated from the incarceration, the cat (or Feline) and the powerful Mutt fairy has to defeat all the enemies and complete all 3 levels and the last level to gain privileges of removing  the crate that contains the kitten that's ought to be rescued. Once the kitten has been rescued the player, namely Feline, has to merge with the kitten so that the last golden coin appears to be retrieved by the kitten so that the mission becomes fully accomplished. 

Controls:

1) SPACE BAR controls both the left and right player sliding animation movement.

2)  The keyboard arrow keys controls both the left and right player movements.

3) A,S,D,W controls the Mutt fairy movements.

4) Control E & ENTER  are both for fire  release.

5) CTRL R refreshes the game page

6)Mouse Clicking on the game area if the game is over for the current game level, instantly restarts the current game level.

7) The additional appended button (s) are for the navigation or switching between different pages or levels of the game.
